last_episode_to_air.name: The Ancestor
last_episode_to_air.overview: The final battle between the Skin Riders and the Reborns begins.

name: Extinct
overview: 400 years after the extinction of the human race, a small group of humans are revived by an alien civilization. The colony of revived humans encounter struggles with the aliens who extinguished humankind centuries before, while trying to understand and get along with the mysterious aliens who revived them.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Four hundred years after the extinction of the human race, a seemingly benevolent alien species regenerates three humans. Confused about their new life, the reborn humans agree to help each other, only to discover new dangers on Earth that threaten to annihilate the human race all over again.

episodes.name: Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: The Reborns explore the abandoned human settlement, and Ezra and Abram must travel to a nearby lake to save an ailing Feena. In the forest, Ezra comes face to face with his past.

episodes.name: The Contract
episodes.overview: Abram discovers an alien structure and attempts to learn more about it, while Ezra seeks to recover an object that may bring back more humans. Feena's troubled past is revealed when a Skin Rider attempts to reach the settlement.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The obelisk agrees to bring back more humans, so Feena travels to the lake to escort the new Reborns back to the settlement. A mysterious girl appears in the forest, and Abram discovers a secret about the first settlers.

episodes.name: Broken
episodes.overview: Silas tries to persuade Lynn to join the Skin Riders. Ezra and Feena set out to rescue Lynn but discover someone else in the process. Meanwhile, Abram uncovers strange new details about his own past.

episodes.name: True or False
episodes.overview: Ezra learns more about the powers and abilities of Skin Riders, Duncan reveals his true intentions, and the Reborns discover information about the first settlers that will forever change them.

episodes.name: Of Two Minds
episodes.overview: While the Skin Riders attempt to penetrate the settlement, the Reborns interrogate Duncan to learn what they can about the previous settlers. Jax returns from the Ancestor and is met with mutiny.

episodes.name: Death Did Us Part
episodes.overview: Ezra and Lynn are captured by the previous settlers and hope to find Kylie among them. Silas attempts to strengthen the Skin Rider parasite, and Feena and Abram search for a buried drone they believe contains vital information.

episodes.name: Wounds
episodes.overview: Ezra and Lynn try to escape the Skin Riders, and Abram attempts to find the Ancestor.

episodes.name: The Ancestor
episodes.overview: The final battle between the Skin Riders and the Reborns begins.
